channel.title: Authors on Huidong Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Huidong Chen

item.description:
I am currently a postdoctoral research fellow at at Massachusetts General Hospital and Harvard Medical School, where I am supervised by Dr.Luca Pinello. I completed both his undergraduate studies and Ph.D. in computer science at Tongji University in China. My research interests lie in the area of computational biology, ranging from machine learning methods to epigenome to transcriptome. In particular I am interested in developing computational methods for single cell analysis.

Personally, I enjoy reading, hiking, running, and also a good Netflix binge.
